title: LET YOUR POWER FLOW
bible_ref: He that believeth on me, as the scripture hath said, out of his belly shall flow rivers of living John 7:38
verses: O Lord, let your power flow=Living water fill me now=That out of me, living water'll flow=Replenishing ev'ry empty heart 2x
chorus: Father, hear my plea=Holy Spirit fill me now=That out of me, living water'll flow=Replenishing ev'ry empty heart (Repeat)=Text: Abel Abikaje=Music: Abel Abikaje
